dict.string:
SimpleSSH aims to make working with SSH servers more comfortable by giving the user a new way of interacting with the server.
It features a simple user interface, user predefined SSH commands, logging and a file browser.
SimpleSSH is beta and will be released in April, 2014. See http://simplessh.hirmer.me for more information.
Years: 2014 Org.: Benedikt Hirmer My Work: Idea Concept Development Distribution Marketing
SSH Client tailored for the iPhone

LiveGrade is a powerful Look and Color Management Solution for primary grading on the film set. LiveGrade gives full control over the colors from digital film cameras' HD-SDI signals.
LiveGrade is developed by Pomfort. I've been working with them as a freelance developer for almost four years.
Years: 2012 - 2014 Org.: Pomfort GmbH My Work: UI redesign for v2 Resizable grading panel UI dimmer More features
Look and Color Management on film set

LiveGrade Pro Remote allows users to control selected features of LiveGrade Pro for OS X.
Years: 2014 Org.: Pomfort GmbH My Work: UI Design UI Implementation More features

The project is about design, implemetation and evaluation of UI controls for independent functions on the iPad. Goal was to evaluate existing and newly created UI controls that can be used for independent functions.
Years: 2013 Org.: TUM, Chair for Ergonomics My Work: Development of UI Controls Automated evaluation workflow in app In-App Tracking and Export of user input
Implementation of prototypes for iPhoto Print Products
iPhoto Print Products in team of Eric Hanson
RAW processing app for OS X for film productions
App Concept, Development and AppStore distribution
Management and configuration of GSM remote controls
UI Implementation (partly), Reporting Center, Playback View HUDs, User saveable column layouts, â€¦
Data management solution for digital film projects from Budget to RAW
Team organization, management and coding support
Holding a lecture unit on AVFoundation for iOS beginners
UI concept, Data Model and Development of Features
